remarks: Re-index an infinite group sum using a bijection.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)
statement:
tsmsf1o.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
tsmsf1o.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
tsmsf1o.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. TopSp ) $.
tsmsf1o.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
tsmsf1o.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
tsmsf1o.s $e |- ( ph -> H : C -1-1-onto-> A ) $.
tsmsf1o $p |- ( ph -> ( G tsums F ) = ( G tsums ( F o. H ) ) ) $.
